data.title: Film Music Reporter
data.meta_description: Varese Sarabande has released a soundtrack album for the thriller Bad Karma. The album features the film's original music composed by Bryce Jacobs, including th
data.text:
Varese Sarabande has released a soundtrack album for the thriller Bad Karma. The album features the film’s original music composed by Bryce Jacobs, including the score, as well as eight songs featuring Genevieve Maynard, Anthony Snape and Fiona Kernaghan. The soundtrack is being released digitally today and is now available to download on iTunes, where you can also check out audio clips. Bad Karma is directed by Suri Krishnamma (Wuthering Heights) and stars Ray Liotta as an ex-pat American who teams up with Australian gangster and drug dealer Mack for a large scale heroin shipment hijack. Dominic Purcell and Vanessa Gray are co-starring. The movie will be released on home video on September 11, 2012. Click here to pre-order the DVD and check out the trailer below.
